By default, adhoc lines are on top of all other shapes and patterns. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is library.AdhocLineLayer.Top.

parameters.sAdhocLineLayer: type: string, description: New value for property adhocLineLayer

setDragOrientation.!description:
Sets a new value for property {@link #getDragOrientation dragOrientation}. Drag orientation of Gantt Chart. This property doesn't limit the mouse cursor position but the dragging ghost position when dragging it around. This property has 3 values:
  • Free: The dragging ghost moves along with your mouse cursor.
  • Horizontal: The dragged ghost only moves horizontally, cross row dragging is restricted. You can use this mode if you only need to change the times of the dragging shape
  • Vertical: Notice Vertical works if only one shape is selected (regardless shapeSelectionMode), it's showing forbidden cursor style on multiple shape selections when you are dragging. You can use this vertical mode if you only want to change the assignment without changing shape times.
When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is Free.

parameters.sDragOrientation: type: sap.gantt.DragOrientation, description: New value for property dragOrientation

setShapeSelectionMode.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getShapeSelectionMode shapeSelectionMode}. Shape selection mode of the Gantt Chart. This property controls whether single or multiple shapes can be selected. When the selection mode is changed, the current selection is removed. The shapeSelectionMode only works if selectable property on the defined Shape is set to true. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is MultiWithKeyboard.

parameters.sShapeSelectionMode: type: sap.gantt.SelectionMode, description: New value for property shapeSelectionMode

sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable.!helpDescription: The Gantt Chart control provides a comprehensive set of features to display hierarchical data and visualized shapes together. It's designed to fully support OData binding, declaring hierarchical data and shapes bindings in XML view. It's the recommended control for new applications.

getEnableSelectAndDrag.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableSelectAndDrag enableSelectAndDrag}. Allows to drag, drop, and resize a shape on explicitly selecting the shape. Default value is true.

detachShapeDoubleClick.!description: Detaches event handler fnFunction from the {@link #event:shapeDoubleClick shapeDoubleClick} event of this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.

setOptimiseRelationships.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getOptimiseRelationships optimiseRelationships}. Configuration that optimizes relationship rendering behaviour by avoiding the rendering of non-interactive relationships. When the flag is enabled, a relationship instance is required in both the predecessor and successor rows, where the shapeTypeStart, and shapeTypeEnd property of relationship are set to default. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

parameters.bOptimiseRelationships: type: boolean, description: New value for property optimiseRelationships

getSnapMode.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getSnapMode snapMode}. Enables snapping of shapes to attach to the nearest visual element while dragging. Default value is None.

getShapeSchemes.!description: Gets content of aggregation {@link #getShapeSchemes shapeSchemes}. Shape schemes of Gantt Chart. Defines all the possible shape schemes in the Gantt chart control. Note:If you don't use expand chart, you can omit this aggregations. If not set, a default sap.gantt.simple.ShapeScheme is provided automatically.

sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable.!constructorDescription:
Creates and initializes a new Gantt Chart Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getWidth width} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize (default: "100%")
    • {@link #getHeight height} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize (default: "100%")
    • {@link #getShapeSelectionMode shapeSelectionMode} : sap.gantt.SelectionMode (default: MultiWithKeyboard)
    • {@link #getShapeOverRelationship shapeOverRelationship} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShapeSelectionSettings shapeSelectionSettings} : object
    • {@link #getShapeHighlightSettings shapeHighlightSettings} : object
    • {@link #getEnableCursorLine enableCursorLine} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getEnableNowLine enableNowLine} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getNowLineInUTC nowLineInUTC} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getEnableVerticalLine enableVerticalLine} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getEnableAdhocLine enableAdhocLine} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getAdhocLineLayer adhocLineLayer} : string (default: library.AdhocLineLayer.Top)
    • {@link #getEnableDeltaLine enableDeltaLine} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getEnableNonWorkingTime enableNonWorkingTime} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getEnableChartDeltaAreaHighlight enableChartDeltaAreaHighlight} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getDeltaLineLayer deltaLineLayer} : string (default: library.DeltaLineLayer.Bottom)
    • {@link #getDatePattern datePattern} : string (default: library.config.DEFAULT_DATE_PATTERN)
    • {@link #getTimePattern timePattern} : string (default: library.config.DEFAULT_TIME_PATTERN)
    • {@link #getEnableExpandedRowBorders enableExpandedRowBorders} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getEnableExpandedRowBackground enableExpandedRowBackground} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getExpandedRowHeight expandedRowHeight} : int
    • {@link #getDragOrientation dragOrientation} : sap.gantt.DragOrientation (default: Free)
    • {@link #getGhostAlignment ghostAlignment} : string (default: library.dragdrop.GhostAlignment.None)
    • {@link #getShowShapeTimeOnDrag showShapeTimeOnDrag} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getSelectionPanelSize selectionPanelSize} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize (default: "30%")
    • {@link #getDisplayType displayType} : sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTableDisplayType (default: Both)
    • {@link #getDisableShapeDoubleClickEvent disableShapeDoubleClickEvent} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowExportTableToExcel showExportTableToExcel} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getEnableSelectAndDrag enableSelectAndDrag} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getDeltaAreaHighlightColor deltaAreaHighlightColor} : sap.gantt.ValueSVGPaintServer (default: "sapUiListSelectionBackgroundColor")
    • {@link #getEnableLassoInvert enableLassoInvert} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowParentRowOnExpand showParentRowOnExpand} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getPrintingBatchSize printingBatchSize} : int (default: 100)
    • {@link #getShowGanttHeader showGanttHeader} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #get_isAppRunningInRTA _isAppRunningInRTA} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getSnapMode snapMode} : sap.gantt.dragdrop.SnapMode (default: None)
    • {@link #getSnapTimeInterval snapTimeInterval} : object (default: {})
    • {@link #getEnableChartOverflowToolbar enableChartOverflowToolbar} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getEnableChartSelectionState enableChartSelectionState} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getEnableChartHoverState enableChartHoverState} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getSelectOnlyGraphicalShape selectOnlyGraphicalShape} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowTextOnGhost showTextOnGhost} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getRelationshipShapeSize relationshipShapeSize} : sap.gantt.simple.relationshipShapeSize (default: Medium)
    • {@link #getUseParentShapeOnExpand useParentShapeOnExpand} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getFindBy findBy} : string[] (default: [])
    • {@link #getFindByOperator findByOperator} : string (default: library.simple.findByOperator.OR)
    • {@link #getIsConnectorDetailsVisible isConnectorDetailsVisible} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getRowHighlightFill rowHighlightFill} : sap.gantt.ValueSVGPaintServer (default: "sapChart_Sequence_1_Plus3")
    • {@link #getRowHighlightAndHoverFill rowHighlightAndHoverFill} : sap.gantt.ValueSVGPaintServer (default: "sapChart_Sequence_1_Plus1")
    • {@link #getHorizontalLazyLoadingEnabled horizontalLazyLoadingEnabled} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getEnablePseudoShapes enablePseudoShapes} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShapeMouseEnterDelay shapeMouseEnterDelay} : int (default: 500)
    • {@link #getShapeMouseLeaveDelay shapeMouseLeaveDelay} : int (default: 500)
    • {@link #getShapeRenderOrder shapeRenderOrder} : string[] (default: [])
    • {@link #getEnableMultipleGhosts enableMultipleGhosts} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getOptimiseRelationships optimiseRelationships} : boolean (default: false)
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getTable table} : sap.ui.table.Table
    • {@link #getAdhocLines adhocLines} : sap.gantt.AdhocLine[]
    • {@link #getSimpleAdhocLines simpleAdhocLines} : sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine[]
    • {@link #getDeltaLines deltaLines} : sap.gantt.simple.DeltaLine[]
    • {@link #getSvgDefs svgDefs} : sap.gantt.def.SvgDefs
    • {@link #getShapeSchemes shapeSchemes} : sap.gantt.simple.ShapeScheme[]
    • {@link #getCalendarDef calendarDef} : sap.gantt.def.cal.CalendarDefs
    • {@link #getAxisTimeStrategy axisTimeStrategy} : sap.gantt.axistime.AxisTimeStrategyBase
    • {@link #getLocale locale} : sap.gantt.config.Locale
    • {@link #getGanttAdaptationData ganttAdaptationData} : sap.gantt.simple.GanttAdaptationData[]
    • {@link #getOverflowToolbarItems overflowToolbarItems} : sap.ui.core.Control[]
    • {@link #getShapeStyles shapeStyles} : sap.gantt.simple.ShapeStyle[]
  • Events
    • {@link #event:shapeSelectionChange shapeSelectionChange} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapeHighlightChange shapeHighlightChange} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapeResize shapeResize} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapeMouseEnter shapeMouseEnter} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapeMouseLeave shapeMouseLeave} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapePress shapePress} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapeDoubleClick shapeDoubleClick} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapeContextMenu shapeContextMenu} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:dragStart dragStart} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapeDrop shapeDrop} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapeConnect shapeConnect} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:visibleHorizonUpdate visibleHorizonUpdate} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:shapeConnectorList shapeConnectorList} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:renderingComplete renderingComplete} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Control#constructor sap.ui.core.Control} can be used as well.

Time in milliseconds where the mouse has moved out of the hovered shape for the specified time before triggering the shapeMouseLeave event When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is 500.

parameters.iShapeMouseLeaveDelay: type: int, description: New value for property shapeMouseLeaveDelay

getLocale.!description: Gets content of aggregation {@link #getLocale locale}. Configuration of locale settings. Most locale settings can be configured in sap.ui.configuration objects. Only the time zone and day-light-saving time options are provided by locale settings. We recommend that you set the type of this argument to sap.gantt.config.Locale. Otherwise some properties you set may not function properly.

insertDeltaLine.!description: Inserts a deltaLine into the aggregation {@link #getDeltaLines deltaLines}.

parameters.oDeltaLine: type: sap.gantt.simple.DeltaLine, description: The deltaLine to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted
parameters.iIndex: type: int, description: The 0-based index the deltaLine should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the deltaLine is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the deltaLine is inserted at the last position

attachRenderingComplete.!description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:renderingComplete renderingComplete} event of this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable itself. This event is fired when Gantt chart is rendered completely.
attachRenderingComplete.!type: fn(oData?: Object, fnFunction: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, oListener?: Object) -> sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable itself
parameters.fnFunction: type: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, description: The function to be called when the event occurs
parameters.oData: type: object, description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

parameters.oSvgDefs: type: sap.gantt.def.SvgDefs, description: The svgDefs to set

setEnableDeltaLine.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableDeltaLine enableDeltaLine}. Flag to show or hide Delta Lines When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bEnableDeltaLine: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableDeltaLine

setPrintingBatchSize.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getPrintingBatchSize printingBatchSize}. Defines the batch size, that is the number of rows, to be printed per iteration. If set to 0, batching is disabled and the entire Gantt chart is printed. This could slow the performance and make the browser non-responsive. Note: Relationship lines can be interrupted if the start and end points are in different canvases. To minimize this effect, choose a bigger batch size, ensuring that the browser is responsive during printing. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is 100.

parameters.iPrintingBatchSize: type: int, description: New value for property printingBatchSize

parameters.fnFunction: type: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

jumpToPosition.!description:
Jumps to a given position on the time axis by updating the visible horizon.

Can be used to implement the function of 'Jump To First', 'Jump To Last' and 'Jump To Current'.

parameters.vValue: type: Date|string|Array, description: A date object or a 14-digit timestamp string in this format: YYYYMMDDHHMMSS. An array can also be passed where the two values determine the start time and end time of the visible horizon.

parameters.fnFunction: type: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

parameters.oShapeStyle: type: sap.gantt.simple.ShapeStyle, description: The shapeStyle whose index is looked for

parameters.oFilter: type: object, description: A key-value pair of a shape property, for example, title: {string} or shapeId: {string}.

addAdhocLine.!description:
Deprecated! Since 1.84 use {@link sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine} instead.
Adds some adhocLine to the aggregation {@link #getAdhocLines adhocLines}.

parameters.oAdhocLine: type: sap.gantt.AdhocLine, description: The adhocLine to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

getShowParentRowOnExpand.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getShowParentRowOnExpand showParentRowOnExpand}. Option to show or hide the parent row on expand. This is applicable only for multi-activity row settings. Default value is true.

setEnablePseudoShapes.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnablePseudoShapes enablePseudoShapes}. Optimizes the rendering of overlapping shapes When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

parameters.bEnablePseudoShapes: type: boolean, description: New value for property enablePseudoShapes

setEnableNonWorkingTime.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableNonWorkingTime enableNonWorkingTime}. Flag to show or hide non-working time When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bEnableNonWorkingTime: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableNonWorkingTime

getUseParentShapeOnExpand.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getUseParentShapeOnExpand useParentShapeOnExpand}. Determines if only tasks need to be used for rendering the expanded shapes. Subtasks are not required. Default value is false.

getShapeSelectionMode.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getShapeSelectionMode shapeSelectionMode}. Shape selection mode of the Gantt Chart. This property controls whether single or multiple shapes can be selected. When the selection mode is changed, the current selection is removed. The shapeSelectionMode only works if selectable property on the defined Shape is set to true. Default value is MultiWithKeyboard.

setIsConnectorDetailsVisible.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getIsConnectorDetailsVisible isConnectorDetailsVisible}. Defines whether shapeConnectorList is displayed upon the click of connector/relationship or not When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

parameters.bIsConnectorDetailsVisible: type: boolean, description: New value for property isConnectorDetailsVisible

getEnableLassoInvert.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableLassoInvert enableLassoInvert}. Enables inversion on shape selection while drawing lasso Default value is false.

unbindAxisTimeStrategy.!description: Unbinds aggregation {@link #getAxisTimeStrategy axisTimeStrategy} from model data.

getEnableChartHoverState.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableChartHoverState enableChartHoverState}. Option to disable or enable the chart row's hover state. Default value is true.

attachShapeDrop.!description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:shapeDrop shapeDrop} event of this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable itself. Event fired when a drag-and-drop occurs on one or more selected shapes.
attachShapeDrop.!type: fn(oData?: Object, fnFunction: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, oListener?: Object) -> sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable itself
parameters.fnFunction: type: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, description: The function to be called when the event occurs
parameters.oData: type: object, description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

getDatePattern.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getDatePattern datePattern}. Specifies how the application's date is displayed in the gantt chart. For example: "dd.MM.yyyy" (31.01.2018) Default value is library.config.DEFAULT_DATE_PATTERN.

getEnableExpandedRowBackground.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableExpandedRowBackground enableExpandedRowBackground}. Property to enable the background color for expanded rows. By default, this would show the row background Default value is true.

setSnapTimeInterval.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getSnapTimeInterval snapTimeInterval}. Defines the least time taken in seconds for a shape to snap while in a particular zoom level. eg. { "4hour":{timeInterval:1800}, ---> 30mins Snap "1hour":{timeInterval:900} ---> 15mins Snap } When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is {}.

parameters.oSnapTimeInterval: type: object, description: New value for property snapTimeInterval

bindAdhocLines.!description:
Deprecated! Since 1.84 use {@link sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine} instead.
Binds aggregation {@link #getAdhocLines adhocLines} to model data. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#bindAggregation ManagedObject.bindAggregation} for a detailed description of the possible properties of oBindingInfo.

setUseParentShapeOnExpand.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getUseParentShapeOnExpand useParentShapeOnExpand}. Determines if only tasks need to be used for rendering the expanded shapes. Subtasks are not required. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

parameters.bUseParentShapeOnExpand: type: boolean, description: New value for property useParentShapeOnExpand

insertAdhocLine.!description:
Deprecated! Since 1.84 use {@link sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine} instead.
Inserts a adhocLine into the aggregation {@link #getAdhocLines adhocLines}.

parameters.oAdhocLine: type: sap.gantt.AdhocLine, description: The adhocLine to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted
parameters.iIndex: type: int, description: The 0-based index the adhocLine should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the adhocLine is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the adhocLine is inserted at the last position

setDisplayType.!description:
Sets a new value for property {@link #getDisplayType displayType}. Defines how the Gantt chart is displayed.
  • If set to Both, both the table and the chart are displayed.
  • If set to Chart, only the chart is displayed.
  • If set to Table, only the table is displayed.
When the parent element of the Gantt chart is the {@link sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartContainer}, this property overrides the displayType property of {@link sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartContainer}. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is Both.

parameters.sDisplayType: type: sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTableDisplayType, description: New value for property displayType

getSelectOnlyGraphicalShape.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getSelectOnlyGraphicalShape selectOnlyGraphicalShape}. Enables selection of only graphical shapes excluding labels. Default value is false.

getDeltaLines.!description:
Gets content of aggregation {@link #getDeltaLines deltaLines}.

The aggregation is used to store configuration of Delta Lines

getTable.!description:
Gets content of aggregation {@link #getTable table}.

Table of the Gantt Chart

You can use {sap.ui.table.Table} if you have a flat list data or {sap.ui.table.TreeTable} if you have hierarchical data.

parameters.oTable: type: sap.ui.table.Table, description: The table to set

getOptimiseRelationships.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getOptimiseRelationships optimiseRelationships}. Configuration that optimizes relationship rendering behaviour by avoiding the rendering of non-interactive relationships. When the flag is enabled, a relationship instance is required in both the predecessor and successor rows, where the shapeTypeStart, and shapeTypeEnd property of relationship are set to default. Default value is false.

getSvgDefs.!description: Gets content of aggregation {@link #getSvgDefs svgDefs}. SVG reusable element definitions. If this property is provided, the paint server definition of the SVG is rendered. Method getDefString() should be implemented by all paint server classes that are passed in in this property. We recommend that you set the type of this argument to sap.gantt.def.SvgDefs. Otherwise some properties you set may not function properly.

fireRenderingComplete.!description: Fires event {@link #event:renderingComplete renderingComplete} to attached listeners.

parameters.mParameters: type: object, description: Parameters to pass along with the event

getSelectionPanelSize.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getSelectionPanelSize selectionPanelSize}. The width of selection panel. In sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable, the selectionPanelSize is the Table/TreeTable width in the embedded Splitter. Default value is "30%".

getShapeStyles.!description:
Gets content of aggregation {@link #getShapeStyles shapeStyles}.

Configuration for the Gantt chart styles. This Aggregation will override shapeStyles aggregation of ganttChartContainer.

getSimpleAdhocLines.!description:
Gets content of aggregation {@link #getSimpleAdhocLines simpleAdhocLines}.

The aggregation is used to store configuration of adhoc lines, adhoc lines represent milestones and events in axis time.

removeAllOverflowToolbarItems.!description:
Removes all the controls from the aggregation {@link #getOverflowToolbarItems overflowToolbarItems}.

Additionally, it unregisters them from the hosting UIArea.

setTimePattern.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getTimePattern timePattern}. Specifies how the application's time is displayed in the gantt chart. For example: "hh:mm a" (12:05 PM) When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is library.config.DEFAULT_TIME_PATTERN.

parameters.sTimePattern: type: string, description: New value for property timePattern

deselectShapes.!description: Deselects a group of shapes specified by the aShapeUids array.

parameters.aShapeUids: type: string[], description: An array of shape UIDs to deselect.

getShowShapeTimeOnDrag.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getShowShapeTimeOnDrag showShapeTimeOnDrag}. Flag to show or hide the start time and end time of a shape when you drag it along the time line. The property takes effect if only one shape is selected or enableMultipleGhosts is set to false. Default value is false.

getWidth.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getWidth width}. Width of the control. Default value is "100%".

setLayoutData.!description: Sets the {@link sap.ui.core.LayoutData} defining the layout constraints for this control when it is used inside a layout.

parameters.oLayoutData: type: sap.ui.core.LayoutData, description: which should be set

getOverflowToolbarItems.!description:
Gets content of aggregation {@link #getOverflowToolbarItems overflowToolbarItems}.

Items can be added in chart overflow toolbar using this aggregation.

setEnableChartOverflowToolbar.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableChartOverflowToolbar enableChartOverflowToolbar}. Option to show or hide the chart overflow toolbar. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

parameters.bEnableChartOverflowToolbar: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableChartOverflowToolbar

insertSimpleAdhocLine.!description: Inserts a simpleAdhocLine into the aggregation {@link #getSimpleAdhocLines simpleAdhocLines}.

parameters.oSimpleAdhocLine: type: sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine, description: The simpleAdhocLine to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted
parameters.iIndex: type: int, description: The 0-based index the simpleAdhocLine should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the simpleAdhocLine is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the simpleAdhocLine is inserted at the last position

getDragOrientation.!description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getDragOrientation dragOrientation}. Drag orientation of Gantt Chart. This property doesn't limit the mouse cursor position but the dragging ghost position when dragging it around. This property has 3 values:
  • Free: The dragging ghost moves along with your mouse cursor.
  • Horizontal: The dragged ghost only moves horizontally, cross row dragging is restricted. You can use this mode if you only need to change the times of the dragging shape
  • Vertical: Notice Vertical works if only one shape is selected (regardless shapeSelectionMode), it's showing forbidden cursor style on multiple shape selections when you are dragging. You can use this vertical mode if you only want to change the assignment without changing shape times.
Default value is Free.

getCalendarDef.!description: Gets content of aggregation {@link #getCalendarDef calendarDef}. Paint servers consumed by special shape sap.gantt.shape.cal.Calendar. This aggregation is designed to improve performance of calendar shapes. Rows usually share a similar definition with calendar shapes. It is possible to define a Calendar paint server to draw only one rectangle for each row. Notes for classes extended from sap.gantt.def.cal.CalendarDef: Different from property paintServerDefs, paint servers defined here must implement method getDefNode() instead of method getDefString().

parameters.oShapeScheme: type: sap.gantt.simple.ShapeScheme, description: The shapeScheme to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

setShapeOverRelationship.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getShapeOverRelationship shapeOverRelationship}. Specifies whether shape is rendered over relationship or relationship over shape when relationship leads through shape. If enabled, shapes are rendered over relationships. If disabled, relationships are rendered over shapes. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bShapeOverRelationship: type: boolean, description: New value for property shapeOverRelationship

setEnableMultipleGhosts.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableMultipleGhosts enableMultipleGhosts}. Flag to enable displaying multiple ghosts when multiple shapes are selected and dragged. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bEnableMultipleGhosts: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableMultipleGhosts

Applicable to triangles, square, diamond, and circle shapes; excluding horizontal rectangle and vertical rectangle shapes. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is Medium.

parameters.sRelationshipShapeSize: type: sap.gantt.simple.relationshipShapeSize, description: New value for property relationshipShapeSize

removeAllShapeSchemes.!description:
Removes all the controls from the aggregation {@link #getShapeSchemes shapeSchemes}.

Additionally, it unregisters them from the hosting UIArea.

parameters.bShowExportTableToExcel: type: boolean, description: New value for property showExportTableToExcel

toggleFullScreen.!description: Toggles the gantt chart from normal to fullscreen mode and vice versa. Works only if gantt chart is inside a gantt container. In the fullscreen mode, gantt container can hold only 1 gantt chart. The {@link sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartContainer#insertGanttChart} and {@link sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartContainer#addGanttChart} functionality of gantt chart container won't work in fullscreen mode.

parameters.bShowToolbar: type: boolean, description: Whether gantt container's toolbar is to be shown in the fullscreen mode along with the gantt chart.
parameters.oButton: type: object, description: Button clicked to toggle the fullscreen mode.

setRowHighlightFill.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getRowHighlightFill rowHighlightFill}. The rowHighlightFill property defines the color that is filled for the highlighted rows when a shape is being dragged The highlighted rows are the ones where the shape drop is allowed When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is "sapChart_Sequence_1_Plus3".

parameters.sRowHighlightFill: type: sap.gantt.ValueSVGPaintServer, description: New value for property rowHighlightFill

getDeltaLineLayer.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getDeltaLineLayer deltaLineLayer}. Specifies the layer on which Delta Lines reside. By default, Delta Lines are above all shapes and patterns. Default value is library.DeltaLineLayer.Bottom.

setEnableSelectAndDrag.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableSelectAndDrag enableSelectAndDrag}. Allows to drag, drop, and resize a shape on explicitly selecting the shape. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bEnableSelectAndDrag: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableSelectAndDrag

setShapeMouseEnterDelay.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getShapeMouseEnterDelay shapeMouseEnterDelay}. Time in milliseconds where the mouse has to be on the same shape for the specified time before triggering the shapeMouseEnter event When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is 500.

parameters.iShapeMouseEnterDelay: type: int, description: New value for property shapeMouseEnterDelay

setDeltaLineLayer.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getDeltaLineLayer deltaLineLayer}. Specifies the layer on which Delta Lines reside. By default, Delta Lines are above all shapes and patterns. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is library.DeltaLineLayer.Bottom.

parameters.sDeltaLineLayer: type: string, description: New value for property deltaLineLayer

getShapeOverRelationship.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getShapeOverRelationship shapeOverRelationship}. Specifies whether shape is rendered over relationship or relationship over shape when relationship leads through shape. If enabled, shapes are rendered over relationships. If disabled, relationships are rendered over shapes. Default value is true.

setHorizontalLazyLoadingEnabled.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getHorizontalLazyLoadingEnabled horizontalLazyLoadingEnabled}. Set to true if Gantt chart is configured to be lazy loaded horizontally. Application should fetch the data only for the visible horizon. Application also should make sure to fetch the relevant data on user interactions like horizontal scroll, zoom out, bird eye which changes the visible horizon until the time when all the data is fetched. This property has to be used with setAllDataLoadedPromise(). When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is false.

parameters.bHorizontalLazyLoadingEnabled: type: boolean, description: New value for property horizontalLazyLoadingEnabled

findAndSelect.!description: Select a group of shapes which matched the search value/property. Selects all the shapes matched the find result irrespective of visible area. selection based on ObjectId(shapeId)
findAndSelect.!type: fn(propertyValue: String, propertyName: String, overrideExisting: Boolean, rowSelection: Boolean)

parameters.rowSelection: type: boolean, description: flag to execute row selection. If set as true all matched shapes in the row can be selected.
parameters.propertyName: type: string, description: property to search the value in. Optional parameter
parameters.propertyValue: type: string, description: value to search for
parameters.overrideExisting: type: boolean, description: flag to override existing selection by UID.

fireShapeConnectorList.!description: Fires event {@link #event:shapeConnectorList shapeConnectorList} to attached listeners.

parameters.mParameters: type: object, description: Parameters to pass along with the event

setEnableChartHoverState.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableChartHoverState enableChartHoverState}. Option to disable or enable the chart row's hover state. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bEnableChartHoverState: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableChartHoverState

parameters.oEvent: type: object, description: must be structured as the following { control: table control, oColumns: [], an array of sorted columns, a column must have a new value oldValues: [], an array of old values for sorted columns }

fireShapeDoubleClick.!description: Fires event {@link #event:shapeDoubleClick shapeDoubleClick} to attached listeners.

parameters.mParameters: type: object, description: Parameters to pass along with the event

getSelectedShapeUid.!description: Get selected shapes in gantt chart.

fullScreenMode.!description: Determines whether gantt chart is in fullscreen mode.

getShapeHighlightSettings.!description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getShapeHighlightSettings shapeHighlightSettings}. A JSON object containing the shapeHighlightSettings that is used to configure shape highlight styles. If nothing is specified, then the default highlight styles (2px dashed black border) is set. Below you can find a brief example 

{
   color: "@sapChart_Sequence_9_Plus2",
   strokeWidth: 2,
   strokeDasharray: "5,1"
   shapeColor: null,
   fillOpacity: 0
}

getAxisTimeStrategy.!description:
Gets content of aggregation {@link #getAxisTimeStrategy axisTimeStrategy}.

This aggregation controls the zoom strategies and zoom rate in Gantt Chart.

indexOfShapeScheme.!description: Checks for the provided sap.gantt.simple.ShapeScheme in the aggregation {@link #getShapeSchemes shapeSchemes}. and returns its index if found or -1 otherwise.

parameters.oShapeScheme: type: sap.gantt.simple.ShapeScheme, description: The shapeScheme whose index is looked for

getRelationshipShapeSize.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getRelationshipShapeSize relationshipShapeSize}. Specifies the size of the relationship's shape. Applicable to triangles, square, diamond, and circle shapes; excluding horizontal rectangle and vertical rectangle shapes. Default value is Medium.

destroyCalendarDef.!description: Destroys the calendarDef in the aggregation {@link #getCalendarDef calendarDef}.

destroyAdhocLines.!description:
Deprecated! Since 1.84 use {@link sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine} instead.
Destroys all the adhocLines in the aggregation {@link #getAdhocLines adhocLines}.

getShapeSelectionSettings.!description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getShapeSelectionSettings shapeSelectionSettings}. A JSON object containing the shapeSelectionSettings which will be used to configure shape selection styles. If nothing is specified, then the default selection styles (2px dashed red border) is set. New properties 'shapeColor' and 'fillOpacity' are introduced as of SAPUI5 1.85 release. Using these, you can configure color and opacity of highlighted shapes in a gantt chart. Below you can find a brief example 

{
   color: "@sapChart_Sequence_9_Plus2",
   strokeWidth: 2,
   strokeDasharray: "5,1"
   shapeColor: null,
   fillOpacity: 0
}

setEnableVerticalLine.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableVerticalLine enableVerticalLine}. Flag to show or hide vertical lines representing intervals along the time axis When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bEnableVerticalLine: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableVerticalLine

fireShapeSelectionChange.!description: Fires event {@link #event:shapeSelectionChange shapeSelectionChange} to attached listeners.

parameters.mParameters: type: object, description: Parameters to pass along with the event

removeSimpleAdhocLine.!description: Removes a simpleAdhocLine from the aggregation {@link #getSimpleAdhocLines simpleAdhocLines}.
removeSimpleAdhocLine.!type: fn(vSimpleAdhocLine: Number | String | sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine) -> sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine | null

parameters.vSimpleAdhocLine: type: int|string|sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine, description: The simpleAdhocLine to remove or its index or id

setEnableChartDeltaAreaHighlight.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableChartDeltaAreaHighlight enableChartDeltaAreaHighlight}. Flag to show or hide Chart Delta Area highlighting When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bEnableChartDeltaAreaHighlight: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableChartDeltaAreaHighlight

getMetadata.!description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable.

bindAxisTimeStrategy.!description: Binds aggregation {@link #getAxisTimeStrategy axisTimeStrategy} to model data. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#bindAggregation ManagedObject.bindAggregation} for a detailed description of the possible properties of oBindingInfo.

updateSelectionByShapeID.!description: Select and deselect shapes based on shapeIDs

parameters.aDeselectedShapeId: type: string[], description: array of shapeIDs to be deselected
parameters.aSelectedShapeId: type: string[], description: array of shapeIDs to be selected

setRowSettingsTempWithInvalid.!description: Call for 'setRowSettingsTemplate' method of table is made with invalidate Also, create the promise to wait for inner gantt rendering

parameters.oRowSettings: type: object, description: Table RowSettings template

setShowParentRowOnExpand.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getShowParentRowOnExpand showParentRowOnExpand}. Option to show or hide the parent row on expand. This is applicable only for multi-activity row settings. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bShowParentRowOnExpand: type: boolean, description: New value for property showParentRowOnExpand

fireShapeMouseEnter.!description: Fires event {@link #event:shapeMouseEnter shapeMouseEnter} to attached listeners.

parameters.mParameters: type: object, description: Parameters to pass along with the event

rebindTableRows.!description: Bind rows of the table aggregtion with given parameters Also, create the promise to wait for inner gantt rendering

parameters.mParameters:
type: object, description: Table Rebind parameters Example: 
	
		rebindTableRows({
			path: "pathToMyTableEntity",
			filters: filters, //"filters" refer to the list all filters that need to be passed to filter my data
			sorter: sorters, //"sorters" refer to the list all sorters that need to be passed to sort my data
			parameters: params // "params" any additional parameters to be passed like select / expand / tree binding parameters
		})

setHeight.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getHeight height}. Height of the control. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is "100%".

parameters.sHeight: type: sap.ui.core.CSSSize, description: New value for property height

destroyAxisTimeStrategy.!description: Destroys the axisTimeStrategy in the aggregation {@link #getAxisTimeStrategy axisTimeStrategy}.

attachShapeHighlightChange.!description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:shapeHighlightChange shapeHighlightChange} event of this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable itself. Fired when the shape's highlight has been changed
attachShapeHighlightChange.!type: fn(oData?: Object, fnFunction: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, oListener?: Object) -> sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable itself
parameters.fnFunction: type: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, description: The function to be called when the event occurs
parameters.oData: type: object, description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

expand.!description: expand one or more rows indices by the shape scheme key. This function takes effect only after the control is fully rendered, otherwise it's doing nothing.

parameters.vRowIndex: type: int|int[], description: A single index or an array of indices of the rows to be collapsed
parameters.vSchemeKey: type: string|string[], description: A single key or an array of scheme keys defined in sap.gantt.simple.ShapeScheme

destroyOverflowToolbarItems.!description: Destroys all the overflowToolbarItems in the aggregation {@link #getOverflowToolbarItems overflowToolbarItems}.

getEnableChartSelectionState.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableChartSelectionState enableChartSelectionState}. Option to disable or enable the chart row's selection state. Default value is true.

addGanttAdaptationData.!description: Adds some ganttAdaptationData to the aggregation {@link #getGanttAdaptationData ganttAdaptationData}.

parameters.oGanttAdaptationData: type: sap.gantt.simple.GanttAdaptationData, description: The ganttAdaptationData to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

getEnableDeltaLine.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableDeltaLine enableDeltaLine}. Flag to show or hide Delta Lines Default value is true.

setEnableChartSelectionState.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableChartSelectionState enableChartSelectionState}. Option to disable or enable the chart row's selection state. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bEnableChartSelectionState: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableChartSelectionState

setEnableCursorLine.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getEnableCursorLine enableCursorLine}. Flag whether to show or hide the cursor line when moving your mouse cursor When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bEnableCursorLine: type: boolean, description: New value for property enableCursorLine

attachShapeContextMenu.!description: Attaches event handler fnFunction to the {@link #event:shapeContextMenu shapeContextMenu} event of this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable. When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified, otherwise it will be bound to this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable itself. This event is fired when you right-click the shape.
attachShapeContextMenu.!type: fn(oData?: Object, fnFunction: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, oListener?: Object) -> sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable itself
parameters.fnFunction: type: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, description: The function to be called when the event occurs
parameters.oData: type: object, description: An application-specific payload object that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event

getChartOverflowToolbar.!description: Returns the gantt chart overflow toolbar instance.

fireShapeConnect.!description: Fires event {@link #event:shapeConnect shapeConnect} to attached listeners.

parameters.mParameters: type: object, description: Parameters to pass along with the event

getFindBy.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getFindBy findBy}. Defines the property names for which findAll method should search in different entities Default value is [].

addSimpleAdhocLine.!description: Adds some simpleAdhocLine to the aggregation {@link #getSimpleAdhocLines simpleAdhocLines}.

parameters.oSimpleAdhocLine: type: sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine, description: The simpleAdhocLine to add; if empty, nothing is inserted

insertShapeStyle.!description: Inserts a shapeStyle into the aggregation {@link #getShapeStyles shapeStyles}.

parameters.oShapeStyle: type: sap.gantt.simple.ShapeStyle, description: The shapeStyle to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted
parameters.iIndex: type: int, description: The 0-based index the shapeStyle should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the shapeStyle is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the shapeStyle is inserted at the last position

getGhostAlignment.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getGhostAlignment ghostAlignment}. The dragging ghost alignment of Gantt Chart. This property define the visual effect of ghost position on dragging, it also effect the parameter value in event shapeDragEnd Default value is library.dragdrop.GhostAlignment.None.

bindSimpleAdhocLines.!description: Binds aggregation {@link #getSimpleAdhocLines simpleAdhocLines} to model data. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#bindAggregation ManagedObject.bindAggregation} for a detailed description of the possible properties of oBindingInfo.

getDisplayType.!description:
Gets current value of property {@link #getDisplayType displayType}. Defines how the Gantt chart is displayed.
  • If set to Both, both the table and the chart are displayed.
  • If set to Chart, only the chart is displayed.
  • If set to Table, only the table is displayed.
When the parent element of the Gantt chart is the {@link sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartContainer}, this property overrides the displayType property of {@link sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartContainer}. Default value is Both.

getHorizontalLazyLoadingEnabled.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getHorizontalLazyLoadingEnabled horizontalLazyLoadingEnabled}. Set to true if Gantt chart is configured to be lazy loaded horizontally. Application should fetch the data only for the visible horizon. Application also should make sure to fetch the relevant data on user interactions like horizontal scroll, zoom out, bird eye which changes the visible horizon until the time when all the data is fetched. This property has to be used with setAllDataLoadedPromise(). Default value is false.

insertShapeScheme.!description: Inserts a shapeScheme into the aggregation {@link #getShapeSchemes shapeSchemes}.

parameters.oShapeScheme: type: sap.gantt.simple.ShapeScheme, description: The shapeScheme to insert; if empty, nothing is inserted
parameters.iIndex: type: int, description: The 0-based index the shapeScheme should be inserted at; for a negative value of iIndex, the shapeScheme is inserted at position 0; for a value greater than the current size of the aggregation, the shapeScheme is inserted at the last position

getEnableExpandedRowBorders.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getEnableExpandedRowBorders enableExpandedRowBorders}. Property to enable borders for expanded rows. By default, only row borders are enabled. Default value is true.

getRowHighlightAndHoverFill.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getRowHighlightAndHoverFill rowHighlightAndHoverFill}. The rowHighlightAndHoverFill property defines the color that is filled for the highlighted and hovered rows when a shape is being dragged The highlighted rows are the ones where the shape drop is allowed Default value is "sapChart_Sequence_1_Plus1".

parameters.bEnabled: type: boolean, description: The flag to control it

fireShapeMouseLeave.!description: Fires event {@link #event:shapeMouseLeave shapeMouseLeave} to attached listeners.

parameters.mParameters: type: object, description: Parameters to pass along with the event

setGhostAlignment.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getGhostAlignment ghostAlignment}. The dragging ghost alignment of Gantt Chart. This property define the visual effect of ghost position on dragging, it also effect the parameter value in event shapeDragEnd When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is library.dragdrop.GhostAlignment.None.

parameters.sGhostAlignment: type: string, description: New value for property ghostAlignment

doBirdEye.!description: The Gantt Chart performs Bird Eye on all visible rows or on a specific row depending on the setting of iRowIndex.

parameters.iRowIndex: type: int, description: zero-based index indicating which row to perform Bird Eye on. If you do not specify iRowIndex, the Gantt chart performs Bird Eye on all visible rows.

removeAllAdhocLines.!description:
Deprecated! Since 1.84 use {@link sap.gantt.simple.AdhocLine} instead.
Removes all the controls from the aggregation {@link #getAdhocLines adhocLines}. Additionally, it unregisters them from the hosting UIArea.

getIsConnectorDetailsVisible.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getIsConnectorDetailsVisible isConnectorDetailsVisible}. Defines whether shapeConnectorList is displayed upon the click of connector/relationship or not Default value is false.

selectShapes.!description: Selects a group of shapes specified by the aShapeUids array. Alternatively, this method deselects all selected shapes when no shape UIDs are provided and the bExclusive parameter is true.

parameters.aShapeUids: type: string[], description: An array of shape UIDs to select.
parameters.bExclusive: type: boolean, description: Optional, whether or not to deselect all previously selected shapes.

getShowTextOnGhost.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getShowTextOnGhost showTextOnGhost}. Option to show or hide shape labels on ghost while dragging. The property takes effect only when enableMultipleGhosts is set to true. Default value is true.

getPrintingBatchSize.!description: Gets current value of property {@link #getPrintingBatchSize printingBatchSize}. Defines the batch size, that is the number of rows, to be printed per iteration. If set to 0, batching is disabled and the entire Gantt chart is printed. This could slow the performance and make the browser non-responsive. Note: Relationship lines can be interrupted if the start and end points are in different canvases. To minimize this effect, choose a bigger batch size, ensuring that the browser is responsive during printing. Default value is 100.

collapse.!description: Collapse the selected row indices by the shape scheme key. This function takes effect only after the control is fully rendered, otherwise it's doing nothing.

parameters.vRowIndex: type: int|int[], description: A single index or an array of indices of the rows to be collapsed
parameters.vSchemeKey: type: string|string[], description: A single key or an array of scheme keys defined in sap.gantt.simple.ShapeScheme

detachShapePress.!description: Detaches event handler fnFunction from the {@link #event:shapePress shapePress} event of this sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable. The passed function and listener object must match the ones used for event registration.
detachShapePress.!type: fn(fnFunction: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, oListener?: Object) -> sap.gantt.simple.GanttChartWithTable

parameters.oListener: type: object, description: Context object on which the given function had to be called
parameters.fnFunction: type: function(sap.ui.base.Event) : void, description: The function to be called, when the event occurs

indexOfOverflowToolbarItem.!description: Checks for the provided sap.ui.core.Control in the aggregation {@link #getOverflowToolbarItems overflowToolbarItems}. and returns its index if found or -1 otherwise.

parameters.oOverflowToolbarItem: type: sap.ui.core.Control, description: The overflowToolbarItem whose index is looked for

setNowLineInUTC.!description: Sets a new value for property {@link #getNowLineInUTC nowLineInUTC}. Flag whether to show the nowLine in UTC or in FLP time. When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is true.

parameters.bNowLineInUTC: type: boolean, description: New value for property nowLineInUTC

extend.!description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.gantt.def.gradient.LinearGradient with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.gantt.def.DefBase.extend}.
extend.!type: fn(sClassName: String, oClassInfo?: Object, FNMetaImpl?: fn()) -> fn()

parameters.oClassInfo: type: object, description: Object literal with information about the class
parameters.FNMetaImpl: type: function, description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class
parameters.sClassName: type: string, description: Name of the class being created

sap.gantt.def.filter.ColorMatrixValue.!description:
Color Matrix Values.

The matrix decides what target color from source color.
